hedline.hl1: The New Kids On The Rack

abstract.p: Photo essay of designs from four upstart companies: Bruce, Madeline King, As Four and Rubin Chapelle (L)

block.p: Company: Bruce Founded: 1998 Designers: Daphne Gutierrez, 29, Nicole Noselli, 29 From: North Bergen and Sparta, N.J. Recent inspiration: Jeff Koons's ''Puppy,'' in Rockefeller Plaza On being the next big thing: ''It's nice to be recognized, but you don't want to be caught in the moment when you're not of the moment.'' -- Gutierrez Strangest New York experience: ''Seeing a pig in a parking lot.'' Looking for: Square footage in Barneys
Wool gauze shirt with lace epaulets, $495, cotton skirt, $420, and leather belt, $195, from Bruce. At Bergdorf Goodman. Neiman Marcus, Beverly Hills. Earrings by Dean Harris.

Company: Madeline King Founded: 1997 Designer: Madeline King, 29 From: Limerick, Ireland Why New York? ''Paris was getting on my nerves.'' Whom would you most like to dress? ''Bono of U2.'' What do you hate about New York? ''Sometimes people talk and talk and don't say anything.'' What do you need to survive here? ''A pair of tweezers, a good map and a loud voice.'' Looking for: Extremes
Leather jacket with satin lining, $1,199, and drop-waist leather skirt, $650, by Madeline King. At 7 Boutique/Gallery, 180 Orchard Street.

Company: As Four Founded: 1998 Designers: GABi, K.A.i., ADi, ANGE Age: ''Together, we're over a hundred.'' -- K.A.I. From: Beirut, Bremerhaven, Tel Aviv, Tajikistan Most important survival tool: Energy Greatest motivator: Boredom On New Yorkers: ''They're very skeptical and bored.'' -- GABI Looking for: Distractions
Organza wrap top, $888.88, treated denim pants, $444.44, and tulle brooch, $111.11, from As Four. At 7 Boutique/Gallery, 180 Orchard Street. High heels by Kaki Daniels.

Company: Rubin Chapelle Founded: 1998 Designers: Kip Chapelle, 29, Sonja Rubin, 28 From: Dayton, Ohio, and Vienna, Austria Whom would you most like to dress? ''Someone who has their own opinion.'' -- Chapelle What bores you? ''If people wear the same thing.'' -- Rubin On a New York state of mind: ''Wanting to see today what you haven't seen yesterday.'' -- Rubin Looking for: Individuals

Wool sweater, $600, and pants,$345, by Rubin Chapelle. At Barneys New York. Hair: Gavin for Jed Root. Makeup: Yasuo Yoshikawa for L'Atelier. Fashion assistants: Johnna Davis and Sarah Perpich. Model: Michelle Ferrara.
